evidence.source_document: Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction and Provisional Class Certification
evidence.text: For the foregoing reasons, Plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction is GRANTED as modified, and two classes are provisionally certified. A separate order for APA vacatur and preliminary injunctive relief will issue.

extracted.value: For the foregoing reasons, Plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction is GRANTED as modified, and two classes are provisionally certified. A separate order for APA vacatur and preliminary injunctive relief will issue.

evidence.source_document: Order Re National Science Foundation's Suspension of Grants
evidence.text: Pursuant to the Preliminary Injunction (Dkt. No. 55), the suspension of the grants at issue here is VACATED. NSF shall RESTORE the affected members of the Form Termination Class to the status quo and REINSTATE the suspended grants.

extracted.value: Pursuant to the Preliminary Injunction (Dkt. No. 55), the suspension of the grants at issue here is VACATED. NSF shall RESTORE the affected members of the Form Termination Class to the status quo and REINSTATE the suspended grants.

evidence.text: the district court issued a class-wide preliminary injunction ordering three government agencies to reinstate research grants

extracted.value: Granted a class-wide preliminary injunction ordering three government agencies to reinstate research grants (June 5, 2025).
Denied the government’s motion for partial stay pending appeal (June 5, 2025).

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction and Provisional Class Certification
evidence.text: Agency Defendants’ grant terminations as to the Form Termination Class and the Equity Termination Class are set aside and vacated.  Plaintiffs also request a preliminary injunction.  In light of the scope of the provisionally certified classes and the findings of this order, the Court will order preliminary injunctive relief barring the Agency Defendants from giving effect to the vacated terminations and restoring the status quo.

extracted.value: The court vacated agency grant terminations and ordered a preliminary injunction on a prospective basis.
